headline: Quaker Chemical (KWR) Tops Q1 Earnings Estimates
summary: Quaker Chemical (KWR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 3.95% and 2.90%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Quaker Chemical (KWR) Tops Q1 Earnings Estimates
raw.summary: Quaker Chemical (KWR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 3.95% and 2.90%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: IFF Declares Dividend for Second Quarter 2025
summary: NEW YORK, May 01, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF) announced that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.40 per share of its common stock, payable on July 11, 2025 to shareholders of record as of June 20, 2025.

headline: International Flavors Set to Report Q1 Earnings: What to Expect?
summary: IFF's Q1 results are likely to reflect the impacts of improved volumes, offset by higher costs.

headline: International Flavors (IFF) Q1 Earnings Preview: What You Should Know Beyond the Headline Estimates
summary: Get a deeper insight into the potential performance of International Flavors (IFF) for the quarter ended March 2025 by going beyond Wall Street's top -and-bottom-line estimates and examining the estimates for some of its key metrics.

headline: IFF Completes Divestiture of Pharma Solutions Business Unit
summary: NEW YORK, May 01, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF) today announced that it has successfully completed the previously announced divestiture of its Pharma Solutions business unit to Roquette.
